Summary: three orange balls in a triangle pattern in one spot for about 30 mins
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dalton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailscoming home from my brothers at around 7:00 pm on m-120 in twin lake mi on 12\27\12, three orange lights in the n.w sky preity high up their they seem to be in a triangle like shape. at first i thought it was the street lights reflecting off may car windows somehow and kept driving, got to my house let the dog out that's when i saw the lights where still their they stayed in the same spot tell they disappeared. it seemed to go behind a cloud and then gone.
